casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. LOWERY
v.
MEDINA CTY. BD. OF ELECTIONS. 2018-0437 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 30, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus and Prohibition. Sua sponte, the parties shall file a response, if any, to Heidi R. Carroll's motion for leave to intervene no later than 10:00 a.m. on April 2, 2018.
